nodes.text: Jaina Solo's lightsaber was a weapon constructed by Jaina Solo at the Jedi academy on Yavin 4 in 23 ABY, when she was a teenager.

At the age of thirteen, Jaina began attending her uncle's Jedi Praxeum. There, along with the rest of her class, she constructed her lightsaber, along with synth crystals, that would produce a purple blade.
